00011 class SockBuf : public std::streambuf, public BaseSocket {
00012 public:
00013     static const int BUFSIZE=BUFSIZ;
00014 
00015     SockBuf() : BaseSocket()
00016         { __initBuf(); }
00018     SockBuf(const Socket &s) : BaseSocket(s)
00019         { __initBuf(); }
00021     SockBuf(type t, protocol prot=ipproto_ip) : BaseSocket(t, prot)
00022         { __initBuf(); } 
00024     SockBuf(int sd) : BaseSocket(sd)
00025         { __initBuf(); }
00026     
00028     void close();
00030     ~SockBuf();
00031 
00032     using BaseSocket::shutdown;
00033 
00034 protected:
00035     virtual int overflow(int c = EOF);
00036     virtual int underflow();
00037     virtual int sync();
00038 
00039 private:
00040     char _inBuf[BUFSIZE], _outBuf[BUFSIZE];
00041     
00042     void __initBuf();
00043 };    
00044 
00046 class SockStream : public std::iostream {
00047 public:
00048     SockStream() : std::iostream(new SockBuf()) 
00049         { exceptions(badbit); }
00051     SockStream(SockBuf &s) : std::iostream(&s) 
00052         { exceptions(badbit); }
00054     SockStream(const Socket &s) : std::iostream(new SockBuf(s))
00055         { exceptions(badbit); }
00057     SockStream(const SockStream &s) : std::iostream(s.sockbuf())
00058         { exceptions(badbit); }
00060     SockStream(type t, protocol prot=ipproto_ip) : std::iostream(new SockBuf(t,prot))
00061         { exceptions(badbit); }
00062  
00064     inline SockBuf* sockbuf() const
00065     { 
00066         return (SockBuf *)rdbuf();
00067     }
00069     inline SockBuf* operator->() 
00070     {
00071         return sockbuf();
00072     }
00073 };
00074 
00076 std::ostream &crlf (std::ostream &s)
00077 {
00078     return s << "\r\n";
00079 }
